description: ff. 15. 210 x 143; 160 x 100 mm. 20 lin. Maghribi. 14th cen. - on fol. 14b-15b the authorʼs autogr. ijāzah for Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad and Abū al-Qaṣīdah ʻAbd al-Raḥmān , the sons of Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Shuʻayb al-ʻUthmānī, dat. 26 Jumādá I, 747. Incip.: ... بسم الله ... هذه وفقنى الله واىاك لطاعته نکت من علوم التنزىل وعىون التأوىل فى تفسىر
author: Naqāwusī, Aḥmad ibn Saʻīd, 14th cent
title: al-Rawḍ al-azʹhar fīmā taḍammanathu Sūrat al-Kawthar min wujūh al-balāghah wa-funūn al-faṣāḥah wa-al-barāʻah.
creator: Naqāwusī, Aḥmad ibn Saʻīd, 14th cent
subject: Qurʼan. Sūrat al-Kawthar—Commentaries—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
